channel.title: software on Dr Gian Lorenzetto
channel.description: Recent content in software on Dr Gian Lorenzetto

item.title: Zombie Scrum and the agile mindset
item.description: One problem I’ve seen on several occasions now is that of Zombie Scrum, or Scrum-by-numbers.

item.title: Running VS Code From the Command Line in Mac OS X
item.description: I’m in love with VS Code, I’ll admit it.

item.title: WebAPI Wildcard In Route
item.description: I recently discovered that it’s possible to include a wildcard (the * character) in a WebApi route.

item.title: Http Delete Returning 415 Unsupported Media Type
item.description: When performing an HTTP Delete with a payload, WebAPI needs the content type to be specified, otherwise you’re likely to see a 415 - Unsupported Media Type response.

item.title: Git Branch Name Capitalisation
item.description: I recently had an odd experience where Git was, seemingly randomly, changing the capitalisation of my branch names.

item.title: Git Delete Local Merged Branches
item.description: Every once in a while I like to clean up my local Git repo and remove all of the local branches that have been merged with a branch on the remote.

item.title: Git Push The Easy Way
item.description: Although I’m a big fan of Git Extensions on Windows, I still prefer the relative safety of the command line when doing things like pushing to the remote.

item.title: APIDays 2016 Highlights
item.description: My notes and highlights from APIDays 2016 in Melbourne.

item.title: YOW! 2015 Highlights
item.description: Some highlights and a short summary from my attendance at YOW!

item.title: Working in a Difficult Environment
item.description: Photo by Rod Long on Unsplash Making the most of a difficult situation.

item.title: Replacing the Windows console with Cmder
item.description: In a previous post I talked about [terminal replacements for Mac OS X]({% post_url 2015-10-22-terminal-replacement-on-mac-os-x %}).
